topic.title: How to Group Related Links by Type

body.p: By default all links from DITA relationship tables or related link elements within topics are grouped under "Related information". So the output look like:Related information Target Topic Target Concept Target Task

It is possible to group the links by target type simply by setting the args.rellinks.group.mode=group-by-type parameter. The output will look like:Related concepts Target Concept Related tasks Target Task Related information Target Topic
